text: aṅṅane avar yūsuphinṟe aṭutt kaṭannucennu. avar paṟaññu: "prabhēā, ñaṅṅaḷeyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷuṭe kuṭumbatteyuṁ vaṟuti bādhiccirikkunnu. tāṇataraṁ carakkumāyāṇ ñaṅṅaḷ vannirikkunnat. atināl aṅṅ ñaṅṅaḷkk aḷav pūrttīkariccutaraṇaṁ. ñaṅṅaḷkk dānamāyuṁ nalkaṇaṁ. dharmiṣṭharkk allāhu arhamāya pratiphalaṁ nalkuṁ; tīrcca.”
